//   Name                             Reg   Size
//   -------------------------------- ----- ----

//   AspectRatioAndInvAspectRatio     c11      1
//   TextureSpaceBlurOrigin           c12      1
//   DistanceFade                     c13      1
//   BloomScreenBlendThreshold        c14      1
//   BloomTintAndThreshold            c15      1
//   SceneColorTexture                s0       1
//   FilterColor1Texture              s1       1
//   LightShaftsTexture               s2       1
//   DNEHexDofTexture1                s3       1
//   ColorGradingLUT                  s4       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, -0.0500000007, 3
    def c2, 5, 4, 0.5, 1.5
    def c3, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 15
    def c4, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0.0625
    def c5, 0.001953125, 0.0078125, 0.064453125, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_CE2DEA7F_0.txt
texldl r6, c220.z, s15
mov r5, c12 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r5.x, r6.x, c220.w, r5.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    max r0.xy, v1.zwzw, c9
    min r1.xy, c9.zwzw, r0
    texld r0, r1, s3
    add r0.w, r0.w, c1.z
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c1.w
    mov r1.xzw, c2
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c0.x
    min r2.x, r1.x, c1.x
    mul_sat r0.w, r0.w, r2.x
    mul r2, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r2, r2, s0
    lrp_pp r3, r0.w, r0.zzxy, r2.zzxy
    dp3_pp r0.x, r3.zwyw, c3
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, -c1.w
    exp_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0.x, c7.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, c14.x
    texld r2, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r2, r2.zzxy, c7.zzxy
    mul_pp r2, r2, c2.y
    mad_pp r2, r2, r0.y, r3
    mov r0.zw, c11
    mad r0.yz, v0.xzww, -r0.xzww, r5.xxyw
    dp2add r0.y, r0.yzzw, r0.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r0.y, r0.y
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, c2.z
    mad r0.z, c10.w, -r1.z, r1.w
    texld_pp r1, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r0.w, r1.w, r1.w
    mul_pp r1, r1.zzxy, c15.zzxy
    mul r1, r0.x, r1
    lrp r3.x, r0.w, r0.z, c10.w
    lrp r4.x, r0.y, c1.x, r3.x
    mul r0.x, c13.x, c13.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c13.x
    lrp_pp r3.x, r0.x, c1.x, r4.x
    mul_pp r0, r2, r3.x
    mad_pp r0, r1, c2.y, r0
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.zwyw, c8.y, c8.x
    rcp r2.z, r1.x
    rcp r2.w, r1.y
    rcp r2.xy, r1.z
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r2
    mul r1.xyw, r0.xwzz, c4.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r1.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r1.x
    mad r1.x, r0.x, c4.w, r1.w
    mad r0.x, r0.y, c3.w, -r0.x
    add r1, r1.xyxy, c5.xyzy
    texld_pp r2, r1.zwzw, s4
    texld_pp r1, r1, s4
    add r2, -r1, r2
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r2, r1

// approximately 56 instruction slots used (7 texture, 49 arithmetic)
